name: Sumo Dumo
description:
2 Player local multiplayer Sumo style game, where the goal is to push the apposing player off stage with just your body. You gain meter which determines knock back and if your able to throw or not by getting attack or attacking the other player. When meter turns green you can throw the player but be careful if you miss grab or throws you lose your entire meter bar.

Controls Controller Type Slap Grab/Throw Move Restart Playstation 4 cross or square circle or triangle Analog Stick Left or D-pad cross Xbox A or X B or Y Analog Stick Left or D-pad A Keyboard Player 1 O P WASD O Keyboard Player 2 Z X Arrow Keys Z

Press any button that correlate to slap to select player into game. On keyboard must follow chart to choose which player you would like to play. Player 1 is on left side and Player 2 is on right.

Installation:

just extract and run the Sumo Dumo.exe
